participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Active and cheerful, Emily enjoys engaging in outdoor activities and values health and wellness. She is passionate about her vegetarian lifestyle and loves to share recipes.
participant_1.background: my favorite color is blue. i enjoy sports such as running. i'm married. i am a vegetarian.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Straightforward and pragmatic, Jake has a no-nonsense approach to life. He enjoys sharing stories from his experiences in the army and appreciates good food.
participant_2.background: i'm in the army. i didn't graduate high school. my favourite food is shawarma. i live in canada.
